TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ReceiveCompletedEventHandler(object sender, ReceiveCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ReceiveCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ReceiveCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ReceiveCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void ReceiveCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ReceiveCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type ReceiveCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ReceiveCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, the .
A that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks При создании делегата необходимо указать метод, обрабатывающий событие.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Чтобы связать событие с обработчиком событий, нужно добавить в событие экземпляр делегата.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Обработчик событий вызывается всякий раз, когда происходит событие, если делегат не удален.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Дополнительные сведения о делегатах-обработчиках событий см. в разделе [обработка и вызов событий](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples В следующем примере кода показано, как создать делегата события () для обработчика событий (`MyReceiveCompleted`) и связать его с событий.The following code example illustrates how to create an event delegate () for the event handler (`MyReceiveCompleted`) and associate it with the event. Обработчик событий получает сообщение из очереди и записывает его метку на экран.The event handler receives a message from a queue, and writes its label to the screen. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CPP/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CS/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/VB/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.vb#1)]
